content.description: Sit start on the bottom crimp-rail on the left side of the obvious arete end of this block. make a big crux move up and left to latch onto the right facing pinch/jug. match this and continue to the standard top-out
content.location: Sit start on the bottom crimp-rail on the left side of the obvious arete end of this block.

content.description:
Small, obscure, and probably not at all worth your time unless you are trying to hike and explore GHSP while also climbing lowball obscura. Bring brushes, as these lines dont get any traffic aside from the occasional intrepid explorer.

 This is a small, 8ft tall overhanging arete with large, far apart ledge holds.   The Wilderness Arete is located directly beside of the Wilderness Overhang. From the Rage Boulders hike slightly uphill to the crest of the Rhododendrons, and then cut left across the wide saddle. the Arete and larger overhanging boulder are both facing away towards the opposite direction when approaching from Rage, so look carefully
